short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add items to your Wishlist Plus Wishlists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WishList Plus extension makes it easy to add products from any website to your universal Wishlist by displaying a simple popup window to help collect the product details.

WishListPlus.com - A quick and easy way to add items from any site to your WishListPlus wishlists.

WishListPlus is a free service that gives you a single list that spans ALL internet sites.  

Create wishlists with products from anywhere and share them with family and friends.
